name: Zero-Trust Integration
description: Applying the DoD Zero Trust Strategy to space mission systems.

cards.title: Seven Pillar Assessment
cards.description: Score each Zero Trust pillar (user, device, network, app, data, visibility, automation) for your weapon system and brief deficits. Ref: DoD ZT Strategy 2022.
cards.summaryText: Know exactly where your Zero Trust program is fragile before audits do.

cards.title: Identity Assurance Drill
cards.description: Test CAC plus derived credential issuance, step-up auth, and role-based claims for ops consoles. Ref: DoDI 8520.02.
cards.summaryText: Identity is the new perimeter—treat it that way daily.

cards.title: Device Posture Enforcement
cards.description: Validate endpoint management baselines (HAFNIUM, CrowdStrike) before granting access via policy engines. Ref: DoDI 8500.01.
cards.summaryText: If the device fails posture checks, it never touches the mission net.

cards.title: Micro-Segment Design
cards.description: Lay out policy decision/enforcement points that isolate payload control planes from support services. Ref: DoD ZT Reference Architecture.
cards.summaryText: Micro-segmentation keeps attackers from pivoting to the payload.

cards.title: Policy Automation Scripts
cards.description: Build IaC playbooks that push Zero Trust policies consistently across environments. Ref: AF DevSecOps Reference Design.
cards.summaryText: Infrastructure as code keeps Zero Trust configs honest.

cards.title: Data Tagging & ABAC
cards.description: Apply attribute-based access control tags (mission, coalition, classification) to telemetry feeds. Ref: CNSSI 1253.
cards.summaryText: Data tagging ensures only the right Guardians see sensitive telemetry.

cards.title: Continuous Diagnostics Loop
cards.description: Instrument telemetry for user behavior analytics, UEBA thresholds, and SOAR triggers. Ref: DHS CDM Program Guidance.
cards.summaryText: Continuous diagnostics close the loop between sensing and acting.

cards.title: Mission App Refactoring
cards.description: Assess legacy mission apps for modern auth, APIs, and logging to determine Zero Trust readiness. Ref: Platform One Playbook.
cards.summaryText: Modernize apps so they can live inside a policy-driven fabric.

cards.title: Mission Risk Scoring
cards.description: Quantify Zero Trust control health vs. mission impact using simple scoring models presented to commanders. Ref: AFDP 1-1 Risk Management.
cards.summaryText: Commanders fund what they understand—make Zero Trust risk real.

cards.title: Coalition Access Guardrails
cards.description: Design per-partner policies, tagging, and monitoring so coalition Guardians get only the data they need. Ref: Combined Space Ops Vision.
cards.summaryText: Enable coalitions without creating backdoors in the network.

cards.title: Legacy System Compensations
cards.description: Document compensating controls when heritage systems can't meet Zero Trust requirements yet. Ref: DoDI 8510.01.
cards.summaryText: Zero Trust is a journey—capture reality without excusing risk.

cards.title: Continuous Authorization Brief
cards.description: Build concise briefings showing metrics, automation coverage, and remediation velocity for cATO sponsors. Ref: DoD CIO cATO Memo 2022.
cards.summaryText: cATO confidence comes from transparent Zero Trust telemetry.
